title: Refactor platedhole use z.discriminatedUnion for type safety
description: Replaces z.union with z.discriminatedUnion for improved type safety in plated hole properties, ensuring shape is required for all variants.
body:
fix #204 
- Replaced z.union([...]) with z.discriminatedUnion("shape", [...]).
- Made shape required in all variants, including "circular_hole_with_rect_pad". 
- Ensured compatibility with existing TypeScript types and validation refinements

title: fix: subcircuit having multiple traces between same pins
description: Fixes the issue where multiple traces could exist between the same pins in a subcircuit, ensuring proper autorouting behavior.
body: `getSimpleRouteJsonFromCircuitJson` collects all the `source_trace` elements whose `subcircuit_id` is this group OR any descendant sub-circuit (even when that subcircuit is having traces which is already routed). And then that simpleRouteJson is passed to the autorouter where the already resolved `source_trace` gets dragged.

description: Adds support for SMTPAD footprint in the TestPoint component, including new pad shapes and default configurations for pads.
body:
## Summary
  - Implement SMTPAD footprint support for TestPoint component
  - Add support for `footprintVariant="pad"` with circle and rect pad shapes
  - Generate correct footprint strings for @tscircuit/footprinter integration

  ## Changes
  - Support `padShape="circle"` with `padDiameter` (default: 1.2mm)
  - Support `padShape="rect"` with `width`/`height` (default: 2mm square)
  - Add comprehensive tests for SMTPAD functionality

  ## Test Plan
  - [x] TypeScript compilation passes
  - [x] Tests added for circle, rect, and default configurations
  - [x] Tests will pass once footprinter SMTPAD support is merged
  (tscircuit/footprinter#291)
